NF.Q: In the column Source Continents of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 10769? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Travel Purposes and column Source Continents is the flow between 2203 and 5227? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 2797 and 3418? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Adventure to node North America and from node Religious Pilgrimage to node North America, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Religious Pilgrimage} to node {North America} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Accommodation to node Historical Site, from node Accommodation to node Hiking Trail, and from node Education to node North America, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Medical to node North America, from node Accommodation to node Shopping District, and from node Adventure to node Europe, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Travel Purposes of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Education to target node Cultural Festival? Please list all node labels along this path.
